function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on built environment in COVID-19 research","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of disease transmission in buildings and urban areas","Mitigation":"Conduct research on the impact of built environment on disease transmission","Technologies":"Data analysis, environmental sensors","People":"Researchers, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Neglect of sustainable development in disease control","Impact":"Failure to address long-term environmental and sustainability concerns in disease control strategies","Mitigation":"Integrate sustainable development principles into disease control measures","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, sustainable urban planning","People":"Policy makers, environmental organizations, urban planners","Owner":"Governments, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Focus on behavioral controls over structural changes","Impact":"Underutilization of the potential contribution of the built environment in disease control","Mitigation":"Explore structural changes and innovations in the built environment for disease control","Technologies":"Building design, ventilation systems, air purification technology","People":"Architects, engineers, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Construction industry, public health organizations"}]}
